# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value and relevance to you, as it is worth $15000 to you personally. I am extending this unique chance to purchase it directly from me at a special offer price of $14500. This represents a remarkable opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a discounted rate, which I believe will greatly benefit you. I trust you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering this special offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
